methods.name: getCompressionThreshold
javadoc: The compression treshold. If the packet is larger than the specified amount of bytes, it will be compressed

methods.name: getPluginNames
javadoc: Used by RCon's Query in the form of "MajorServerMod 1.2.3: MyPlugin 1.3" AnotherPlugin 2.1" AndSoForth 1.0".

methods.name: getServerName
javadoc: Returns the server message of the day

methods.name: getServerPort
javadoc: Never used, but "getServerPort" is already taken.

methods.name: getSpawnProtectionRadius
javadoc: Return the spawn protection area's size.

methods.name: initServer
javadoc: Initialises the server and starts it.

methods.name: isCommandBlockEnabled
javadoc: Return whether command blocks are enabled.

methods.name: isEpollEnabled
javadoc: Get if native transport should be used. Native transport means linux server performance improvements and optimized packet sending/receiving on linux

methods.name: isPublished
javadoc: Returns true if this integrated server is open to LAN

methods.name: onServerExit
javadoc: Directly calls System.exit(0), instantly killing the program.

methods.name: runCommand
javadoc: Handle a command received by an RCon instance

methods.name: stopServer
javadoc: Saves all necessary data as preparation for stopping the server.
